item.title: Large-Cap Segment Sees Mixed Performance Amid Defensive and Cyclical Divergence
item.description: The large-cap segment, represented by the BSE 100 index, has experienced a modest decline over recent sessions, reflecting a cautious market mood. While select heavyweight stocks have demonstrated resilience, the broader index has slipped by 0.93% on the day and 1.59% over the past five trading days, underscoring the ongoing tussle between defensive and cyclical sectors. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Small-Cap Segment Edges Higher Amid Mixed Breadth and Selective Upgrades
item.description: The BSE Smallcap index edged higher by 0.21% on 24 Feb 2026, marking a modest gain in a market environment characterised by uneven breadth and sectoral divergence. While select small-cap stocks delivered robust returns, the overall segment grappled with a significant number of decliners, reflecting cautious investor sentiment and selective buying interest. Time: 2 hours ago
